TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit XContainer extends System.Xml.Linq.XNode
Public MustInherit Class XContainer Inherits XNode
public ref class XContainer abstract : System::Xml::Linq::XNode

summary.span: 代表可包含其他節點的節點。

span.span: Represents a node that can contain other nodes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會提供功能，例如尋找下一個或上一個同層級節點，或控制節點的直接子系的列舉。This class provides functionality such as finding the next or previous sibling node, or enumerating the direct children of a node. 兩個類別衍生自都和。The two classes that derive from are and .

summary.span: 將指定的內容當做子系加入至這個 。

span.span: Adds the specified content as children to this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會加入新的內容之後的現有內容。This method adds the new content after the existing content of the . 如需可以傳遞至此函式的有效內容的詳細資訊，請參閱[有效內容的 XElement 和 XDocument 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). 這個方法會引發而事件。This method will raise the and the events. ## Examples 下列範例會建立兩個 XML 樹狀結構，然後會使用此方法加入其中一個查詢的結果。The following example creates two XML trees, and then uses this method to add the results of a query to one of them. ```csharp XElement srcTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Element1", 1), new XElement("Element2", 2), new XElement("Element3", 3), new XElement("Element4", 4), new XElement("Element5", 5) ); XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("NewElement", "Content") ); xmlTree.Add( from el in srcTree.Elements() where (int)el >= 3 select el ); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ Content xmlTree.Add( _ From el In srcTree.Elements _ Where CInt(el) >= 3 _ Select el) Console.WriteLine(xmlTree) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml Content 3 4 5 ```

summary.span: 加入指定的內容做為此 的子系。

span.span: Adds the specified content as children of this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會加入新的內容之後的現有內容。This method adds the new content after the existing content of the . 如需可以傳遞至此函式的有效內容的詳細資訊，請參閱[有效內容的 XElement 和 XDocument 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). 這個方法會引發而事件。This method will raise the and the events. ## Examples 下列範例會建立兩個 XML 樹狀結構，並再使用此方法將至其中的物件。The following example creates two XML trees, and then uses this method to add an object to one of them. 它也會加入的結果[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]查詢 XML 樹狀結構。It also adds the results of a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query to the XML tree. ```csharp XElement srcTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Element1", 1), new XElement("Element2", 2), new XElement("Element3", 3), new XElement("Element4", 4), new XElement("Element5", 5) ); XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XElement("Child3", 3), new XElement("Child4", 4), new XElement("Child5", 5) ); xmlTree.Add(new XElement("NewChild", "new content")); xmlTree.Add( from el in srcTree.Elements() where (int)el > 3 select el ); // Even though Child9 does not exist in srcTree, the following statement will not // throw an exception, and nothing will be added to xmlTree. xmlTree.Add(srcTree.Element("Child9")); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 xmlTree.Add(New XElement("NewChild", "new content")) xmlTree.Add( _ From el In srcTree.Elements() _ Where CInt(el) > 3 _ Select el _ ) ' Even though Child9 does not exist in srcTree, the following statement will not ' throw an exception, and nothing will be added to xmlTree. xmlTree.Add(srcTree.) Console.WriteLine(xmlTree) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 1 2 3 4 5 new content 4 5 ```

summary.span: 加入指定的內容做為此 的子系。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會加入新的內容之後的現有內容。This method adds the new content after the existing content of the . 如需可以傳遞至此函式的有效內容的詳細資訊，請參閱[有效內容的 XElement 和 XDocument 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). 這個方法會引發而事件。This method will raise the and the events. ## Examples 下列範例會建立兩個 XML 樹狀結構，然後使用這個方法將至其中的物件。The following example creates two XML trees, uses this method to add an object to one of them. 它也會加入的結果[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]查詢 XML 樹狀結構。It also adds the results of a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query to the XML tree. ```csharp XElement srcTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Element1", 1), new XElement("Element2", 2), new XElement("Element3", 3), new XElement("Element4", 4), new XElement("Element5", 5) ); XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XElement("Child3", 3), new XElement("Child4", 4), new XElement("Child5", 5) ); xmlTree.Add(new XElement("NewChild", "new content")); xmlTree.Add( from el in srcTree.Elements() where (int)el > 3 select el ); // Even though Child9 does not exist in srcTree, the following statement will not // throw an exception, and nothing will be added to xmlTree xmlTree.Add(srcTree.Element("Child9")); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 xmlTree.Add(New XElement("NewChild", "new content")) xmlTree.Add( _ From el In srcTree.Elements() _ Where CInt(el) > 3 _ Select el _ ) ' Even though Child9 does not exist in srcTree, the following statement will not ' throw an exception, and nothing will be added to xmlTree xmlTree.Add(srcTree.) Console.WriteLine(xmlTree) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 1 2 3 4 5 new content 4 5 ```

summary.span: 加入指定的內容，以當做此文件或項目的第一個子系。

span.span: Adds the specified content as the first children of this document or element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會加入新的內容，現有的內容之前。This method adds the new content before the existing content of the . 如需可以傳遞至此函式的有效內容的詳細資訊，請參閱[有效內容的 XElement 和 XDocument 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). 這個方法會引發而事件。This method will raise the and the events. ## Examples 下列範例會建立兩個 XML 樹狀結構，然後會使用此方法加入其中一個查詢的結果。The following example creates two XML trees, and then uses this method to add the results of a query to one of them. ```csharp XElement srcTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Element1", 1), new XElement("Element2", 2), new XElement("Element3", 3), new XElement("Element4", 4), new XElement("Element5", 5) ); XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("NewElement", "Content") ); xmlTree.AddFirst( from el in srcTree.Elements() where (int)el >= 3 select el ); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim xmlTree As XElement = Content xmlTree.AddFirst( _ From el In srcTree.Elements _ Where CInt(el) >= 3 _ Select el) Console.WriteLine(xmlTree) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 3 4 5 Content ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會加入新的內容，現有的內容之前。This method adds the new content before the existing content of the . 如需可以傳遞至此函式的有效內容的詳細資訊，請參閱[有效內容的 XElement 和 XDocument 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). 這個方法會引發而事件。This method will raise the and the events. ## Examples 下列範例會建立兩個 XML 樹狀結構，然後使用這個方法將至其中的第一個元素的物件。The following example creates two XML trees, uses this method to add an object as the first element to one of them. 它也會加入的結果[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]查詢 XML 樹狀結構。It also adds the results of a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query to the XML tree. ```csharp XElement srcTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Element1", 1), new XElement("Element2", 2), new XElement("Element3", 3), new XElement("Element4", 4), new XElement("Element5", 5) ); XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XElement("Child3", 3), new XElement("Child4", 4), new XElement("Child5", 5) ); xmlTree.AddFirst(new XElement("NewChild", "new content")); xmlTree.AddFirst( from el in srcTree.Elements() where (int)el > 3 select el ); // Even though Child9 does not exist in srcTree, the following statement will not // throw an exception, and nothing will be added to xmlTree xmlTree.AddFirst(srcTree.Element("Child9")); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 xmlTree.AddFirst(New XElement("NewChild", "new content")) xmlTree.AddFirst( _ From el In srcTree.Elements() _ Where CInt(el) > 3 _ Select el _ ) ' Even though Child9 does not exist in srcTree, the following statement will not ' throw an exception, and nothing will be added to xmlTree xmlTree.AddFirst(srcTree.) Console.WriteLine(xmlTree) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 4 5 new content 1 2 3 4 5 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會加入新的內容，現有的內容之前。This method adds the new content before the existing content of the . 如需可以傳遞至此函式的有效內容的詳細資訊，請參閱[有效內容的 XElement 和 XDocument 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). 這個方法會引發而事件。This method will raise the and the events. ## Examples 下列範例會建立兩個 XML 樹狀結構，並使用此方法將至其中的第一個元素的物件。The following example creates two XML trees, and uses this method to add an object as the first element to one of them. 它也會加入的結果[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]查詢 XML 樹狀結構。It also adds the results of a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query to the XML tree. ```csharp XElement srcTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Element1", 1), new XElement("Element2", 2), new XElement("Element3", 3), new XElement("Element4", 4), new XElement("Element5", 5) ); XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XElement("Child3", 3), new XElement("Child4", 4), new XElement("Child5", 5) ); xmlTree.AddFirst(new XElement("NewChild", "new content")); xmlTree.AddFirst( from el in srcTree.Elements() where (int)el > 3 select el ); // Even though Child9 does not exist in srcTree, the following statement will not // throw an exception, and nothing will be added to xmlTree. xmlTree.AddFirst(srcTree.Element("Child9")); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 xmlTree.AddFirst(New XElement("NewChild", "new content")) xmlTree.AddFirst( _ From el In srcTree.Elements() _ Where CInt(el) > 3 _ Select el _ ) ' Even though Child9 does not exist in srcTree, the following statement will not ' throw an exception, and nothing will be added to xmlTree. xmlTree.AddFirst(srcTree.) Console.WriteLine(xmlTree) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 4 5 new content 1 2 3 4 5 ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.XmlWriter CreateWriter() cil managed

summary.span: 建立可以用來將節點加入到 的 。

span.span: Creates an that can be used to add nodes to the .
An that is ready to have content written to it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列化時，會推斷 XML 樹狀結構中的命名空間屬性的命名空間前置詞。While serializing, namespace prefixes are inferred from the namespace attributes in the XML tree. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理 XML 命名空間](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430). ## Examples 您可以使用這個方法來執行 XSLT 轉換。You can use this method to perform an XSLT transformation. 您可以建立 XML 樹狀結構、 建立從 XML 樹狀結構中，請建立新的文件，並建立將寫入新文件。You can create an XML tree, create an from the XML tree, create a new document, and create a that will write into the new document. 然後，您可以叫用 XSLT 轉換，並傳遞和的轉換。Then, you can invoke the XSLT transformation, passing the and to the transform. 轉換成功完成後，系統會使用轉換的結果填入新的 XML 樹狀結構。After the transformation successfully completes, the new XML tree is populated with the results of the transformation. ```csharp string xslMarkup = @" "; XDocument xmlTree = new XDocument( new XElement("Parent", new XElement("Child1", "Child1 data"), new XElement("Child2", "Child2 data") ) ); XDocument newTree = new XDocument(); using (XmlWriter writer = newTree.CreateWriter()) { // Load the style sheet. XslCompiledTransform xslt = new XslCompiledTransform(); xslt.Load(XmlReader.Create(new StringReader(xslMarkup))); // Execute the transform and output the results to a writer. xslt.Transform(xmlTree.CreateReader(), writer); } Console.WriteLine(newTree); ``` ```vb Dim xslMarkup As XDocument = _ Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ Child1 data Child2 data Dim newTree As XDocument = New XDocument() Using writer As XmlWriter = newTree.CreateWriter() ' Load the style sheet. Dim xslt As XslCompiledTransform = _ New XslCompiledTransform() xslt.Load(xslMarkup.CreateReader()) ' Execute the transform and output the results to a writer. xslt.Transform(xmlTree.CreateReader(), writer) End Using Console.WriteLine(newTree) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml Child1 data Child2 data ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Xml.Linq.XNode> DescendantNodes() cil managed
Public Function DescendantNodes () As IEnumerable(Of XNode)

summary.span: 依照文件順序，傳回這個文件或項目之子代節點的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of the descendant nodes for this document or element, in document order.

returns.span: 的 ，包含 的子代節點 (依照文件順序)。

span.span: An of containing the descendant nodes of the , in document order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，屬性不會被視為是中的節點[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]，因此它們不會由這個方法會傳回集合的一部分。Note that attributes are not considered to be nodes in [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)], so they will not be part of the collection that is returned by this method. 這個方法會使用延後的執行。This method uses deferred execution. ## Examples 下列範例會建立 XML 樹狀結構，並接著逐一軸。The following example creates an XML tree, and then iterates through the axis. ```csharp XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", // Attributes are not nodes, so will not be returned by DescendantNodes. new XAttribute("Att1", "AttributeContent"), new XElement("Child", new XElement("GrandChild", "element content") ) ); IEnumerable dnas = from node in xmlTree.DescendantNodes() select node; foreach (XNode node in dnas) { if (node is XElement) Console.WriteLine((node as XElement).Name); else Console.WriteLine(node); } ``` ```vb ' Attributes are not nodes, so will not be returned by DescendantNodes. Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ element content Dim dnas = From node In xmlTree.DescendantNodes _ Select node For Each node In dnas If TypeOf node Is XElement Then Console.WriteLine(DirectCast(node, XElement).Name) Else Console.WriteLine(node) End If Next ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Child GrandChild element content ```

summary.span: 依照文件順序，傳回這個項目或文件之子代項目的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of the descendant elements for this document or element, in document order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會使用延後的執行。This method uses deferred execution.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Xml.Linq.XElement> Descendants() cil managed
Public Function Descendants () As IEnumerable(Of XElement)

summary.span: 依照文件順序，傳回這個項目或文件之子代項目的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of the descendant elements for this document or element, in document order.

returns.span: 的 ，包含 的子代項目。

span.span: An of containing the descendant elements of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，這個方法會傳回本身在產生。Note that this method will not return itself in the resulting . 請參閱如果您需要包含目前結果中。See if you need to include the current in the results. 這個方法會使用延後的執行。This method uses deferred execution. ## Examples 下列範例會建立 XML 樹狀結構，然後使用此座標軸方法來擷取子系。The following example creates an XML tree, and then uses this axis method to retrieve the descendants. ```csharp XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att1", "AttributeContent"), new XElement("Child", new XText("Some text"), new XElement("GrandChild", "element content") ) ); IEnumerable de = from el in xmlTree.Descendants() select el; foreach (XElement el in de) Console.WriteLine(el.Name); ``` ```vb ' Attributes are not nodes, so will not be returned by DescendantNodes. Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ Some text element content Dim de = From el In xmlTree.Descendants _ Select el For Each el In de Console.WriteLine(el.Name) Next ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Child GrandChild ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Xml.Linq.XElement> Descendants(class System.Xml.Linq.XName name) cil managed
Public Function Descendants (name As XName) As IEnumerable(Of XElement)

span.span: The to match.

summary.span: 依照文件順序，傳回這個文件或項目之已篩選子代項目的集合。

span.span: Returns a filtered collection of the descendant elements for this document or element, in document order.

summary.span: 集合中只會包含具有相符之 的項目。

span.span: Only elements that have a matching are included in the collection.

returns.span: 的 ，包含符合指定 之 的子代項目。

span.span: An of containing the descendant elements of the that match the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會使用延後的執行。This method uses deferred execution. ## Examples 下列範例會列印項目的所有子代。The following example prints all descendants of an element. ```csharp // Attributes are not nodes, so will not be returned by DescendantNodes. XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att1", "AttributeContent"), new XElement("Child", new XText("Some text"), new XElement("GrandChild", "element content") ) ); IEnumerable de = from el in xmlTree.Descendants("Child") select el; foreach (XElement el in de) Console.WriteLine(el.Name); ``` ```vb ' Attributes are not nodes, so will not be returned by the descendants axis. Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ Some text element content Dim de = From el In xmlTree... _ Select el For Each el In de Console.WriteLine(el.Name) Next ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Child ``` 以下是相同的範例，但在此情況下的 XML 位於命名空間。The following is the same example, but in this case the XML is in a namespace. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理 XML 命名空間](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430). ```csharp // Attributes are not nodes, so will not be returned by DescendantNodes. XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement xmlTree = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XAttribute(aw + "Att1", "AttributeContent"), new XElement(aw + "Child", new XText("Some text"), new XElement(aw + "GrandChild", "element content") ) ); IEnumerable de = from el in xmlTree.Descendants(aw + "Child") select el; foreach (XElement el in de) Console.WriteLine(el.Name); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() ' Attributes are not nodes, so will not be returned by the descendants axis. Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ Some text element content Dim de = From el In xmlTree... _ Select el For Each el In de Console.WriteLine(el.Name) Next End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` {http://www.adventure-works.com}Child ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.Linq.XElement Element(class System.Xml.Linq.XName name) cil managed
Public Function Element (name As XName) As XElement

span.span: The to match.

summary.span: 取得具有指定之 的第一個 (依據文件順序) 子項目。

span.span: Gets the first (in document order) child element with the specified .

returns.span: 符合指定之 的 ，或者 。

span.span: A that matches the specified , or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回`null`如果沒有具有指定名稱的項目。Returns `null` if there is no element with the specified name. 有些座標軸方法傳回的項目或屬性的集合。Some axis methods return collections of elements or attributes. 這個方法會傳回單一項目。This method returns only a single element. 這個方法會傳回`null`如果找不到具有指定名稱的項目。This method returns `null` if the element with the specified name is not found. 所有的方法，可讓您建構項目 (的建構函式，等等) 接受`null`做為有效的引數。All of the methods that allow you to construct elements (the constructor of , , and so on) accept `null` as a valid argument. 這可讓您使用便利的慣用語： 您可以呼叫此方法做為一部分功能結構，而且項目會加入至如果且只有項目存在於來源樹狀結構建構 XML 樹狀結構。This allows you to use a convenient idiom: you can call this method as part of functional construction, and the element is added to the XML tree being constructed if and only if the element exists in the source tree. 下列範例會顯示此慣用語。The following example shows this idiom. 相對於，這個方法不是座標軸方法。In contrast to , this method is not an axis method. 它不會使用延後的執行;它只會傳回項目時呼叫。It does not use deferred execution; it simply returns an element when called. ## Examples 下列範例會示範這個方法的兩種用途。The following example shows two uses of this method. 在其中一個案例，此方法會尋找中的項目`srcTree`。In one case, the method finds the element in `srcTree`. 在第二個案例中，此方法找不到項目在來源樹狀目錄中，沒有任何項目加入至`xmlTree`，而且會擲回任何例外狀況。In the second case, the method does not find the element in the source tree, no element is added to `xmlTree`, and no exception is thrown. 請注意，Visual Basic 範例會使用 XML 屬性的子系。Note that the Visual Basic example uses the child XML property. 它也可使用直接在 Visual Basic 中的方法。It is also allowable to use the method directly in Visual Basic. ```csharp XElement srcTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Element1", 1), new XElement("Element2", 2), new XElement("Element3", 3), new XElement("Element4", 4), new XElement("Element5", 5) ); XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XElement("Child3", 3), new XElement("Child4", 4), new XElement("Child5", 5), srcTree.Element("Element3"), // Even though Element9 does not exist in srcTree, the following line // will not throw an exception. srcTree.Element("Element9") ); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 <%= srcTree. %> <%= srcTree. %> ' Even though Element9 does not exist in srcTree, adding it to the tree ' will not throw an exception. Console.WriteLine(xmlTree) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 1 2 3 4 5 3 ``` 以下是相同的範例，但在此情況下的 XML 位於命名空間。The following is the same example, but in this case the XML is in a namespace. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理 XML 命名空間](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430). ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement srcTree = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XAttribute(XNamespace.Xmlns + "aw", "http://www.adventure-works.com"), new XElement(aw + "Element1", 1), new XElement(aw + "Element2", 2), new XElement(aw + "Element3", 3), new XElement(aw + "Element4", 4), new XElement(aw + "Element5", 5) ); XElement xmlTree = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XAttribute(XNamespace.Xmlns + "aw", "http://www.adventure-works.com"), new XElement(aw + "Child1", 1), new XElement(aw + "Child2", 2), new XElement(aw + "Child3", 3), new XElement(aw + "Child4", 4), new XElement(aw + "Child5", 5), srcTree.Element(aw + "Element3"), // Even though Element9 does not exist in srcTree, the following line // will not throw an exception. srcTree.Element(aw + "Element9") ); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim srcTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 <%= srcTree. %> <%= srcTree. %> ' Even though Element9 does not exist in srcTree, adding it to the tree ' will not throw an exception. Console.WriteLine(xmlTree) End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 1 2 3 4 5 3 ```

summary.span: 依照文件順序，傳回這個項目或文件之子代項目的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of the child elements of this element or document, in document order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會使用延後的執行。This method uses deferred execution.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Xml.Linq.XElement> Elements() cil managed
Public Function Elements () As IEnumerable(Of XElement)

summary.span: 依照文件順序，傳回這個項目或文件之子代項目的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of the child elements of this element or document, in document order.

returns.span: 的 ，包含此 的子項目 (依據文件順序)。

span.span: An of containing the child elements of this , in document order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會使用延後的執行。This method uses deferred execution. ## Examples 下列範例會建立 XML 樹狀結構，，，然後選取 使用此座標軸方法的某些項目。The following example creates an XML tree, and then selects some elements using this axis method. ```csharp XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XElement("Child3", 3), new XElement("Child4", 4), new XElement("Child5", 5) ); IEnumerable elements = from el in xmlTree.Elements() where (int)el <= 3 select el; foreach (XElement el in elements) Console.WriteLine(el); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim elements = From el In xmlTree.Elements _ Where el.Value <= 3 _ Select el For Each el In elements Console.WriteLine(el) Next ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` 1 2 3 ``` 以下是相同的範例，但在此情況下的 XML 位於命名空間。The following is the same example, but in this case the XML is in a namespace. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理 XML 命名空間](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430). ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement xmlTree = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XAttribute(XNamespace.Xmlns + "aw", "http://www.adventure-works.com"), new XElement(aw + "Child1", 1), new XElement(aw + "Child2", 2), new XElement(aw + "Child3", 3), new XElement(aw + "Child4", 4), new XElement(aw + "Child5", 5) ); IEnumerable elements = from el in xmlTree.Elements() where (int)el <= 3 select el; foreach (XElement el in elements) Console.WriteLine(el); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim elements = From el In xmlTree.Elements _ Where el.Value <= 3 _ Select el For Each el In elements Console.WriteLine(el) Next End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` 1 2 3 ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Xml.Linq.XElement> Elements(class System.Xml.Linq.XName name) cil managed
Public Function Elements (name As XName) As IEnumerable(Of XElement)

span.span: The to match.

span.span: Returns a filtered collection of the child elements of this element or document, in document order.

summary.span: 集合中只會包含具有相符之 的項目。

span.span: Only elements that have a matching are included in the collection.

returns.span: 的 ，包含具有符合 之 的子項目 (依據文件順序)。

span.span: An of containing the children of the that have a matching , in document order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會使用延後的執行。This method uses deferred execution. ## Examples 下列範例會建立 XML 樹狀結構，，，然後選取 使用此座標軸方法的幾個子項目。The following example creates an XML tree, and then selects several child elements using this axis method. ```csharp XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Type1", 1), new XElement("Type1", 2), new XElement("Type2", 3), new XElement("Type2", 4), new XElement("Type2", 5) ); IEnumerable elements = from el in xmlTree.Elements("Type2") select el; foreach (XElement el in elements) Console.WriteLine(el); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim elements = From el In xmlTree. _ Select el For Each el In elements Console.WriteLine(el) Next ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` 3 4 5 ``` 以下是相同的範例，但在此情況下的 XML 位於命名空間。The following is the same example, but in this case the XML is in a namespace. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理 XML 命名空間](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430). ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement xmlTree = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XAttribute(XNamespace.Xmlns + "aw", "http://www.adventure-works.com"), new XElement(aw + "Type1", 1), new XElement(aw + "Type1", 2), new XElement(aw + "Type2", 3), new XElement(aw + "Type2", 4), new XElement(aw + "Type2", 5) ); IEnumerable elements = from el in xmlTree.Elements(aw + "Type2") select el; foreach (XElement el in elements) Console.WriteLine(el); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim elements = From el In xmlTree. _ Select el For Each el In elements Console.WriteLine(el) Next End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` 3 4 5 ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FirstNode As XNode
public: property System::Xml::Linq::XNode ^ FirstNode { System::Xml::Linq::XNode ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得此節點的第一個子節點。

span.span: Get the first child node of this node.

value.span: 包含 的第一個節點。

span.span: An containing the first child node of the .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會建立此項目包含子項目。The following example creates an element that contains child elements. 然後，它會取得第一個子節點的父項目。It then gets the first child node of the parent element. ```csharp XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XElement("Child3", 3), new XElement("Child4", 4), new XElement("Child5", 5) ); XNode firstNode = xmlTree.FirstNode; Console.WriteLine(firstNode); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim firstNode As XNode = xmlTree.FirstNode Console.WriteLine(firstNode) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 1 ```

value.span: 包含 的最後一個節點。

span.span: An containing the last child node of the .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會建立此項目包含子項目。The following example creates an element that contains child elements. 然後，它會取得最後一個子節點的父項目。It then gets the last child node of the parent element. ```csharp XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XElement("Child3", 3), new XElement("Child4", 4), new XElement("Child5", 5) ); XNode lastNode = xmlTree.LastNode; Console.WriteLine(lastNode); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim lastNode As XNode = xmlTree.LastNode Console.WriteLine(lastNode) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 5 ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Xml.Linq.XNode> Nodes() cil managed
Public Function Nodes () As IEnumerable(Of XNode)

summary.span: 依照文件順序，傳回這個項目或文件之子代節點的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of the child nodes of this element or document, in document order.

returns.span: 的 ，包含此 的內容 (根據文件順序)。

span.span: An of containing the contents of this , in document order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，內容不包含屬性。Note that the content does not include attributes. 在 [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]，屬性不會被視為是樹狀結構的節點。In [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)], attributes are not considered to be nodes of the tree. 它們是項目相關聯的名稱/值組。They are name/value pairs associated with an element. 這個方法會使用延後的執行。This method uses deferred execution. ## Examples 下列範例會建立與各種不同的節點類型的 XML 樹狀結構。The following example creates an XML tree with a variety of types of nodes. 然後，它會查詢此列舉來列印節點的座標軸方法。It then queries this axis method to enumerate and print the nodes. ```csharp XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XComment("a comment"), new XElement("Child3", 3), new XElement("Child4", 4), new XText("mixed content"), new XElement("Child5", 5) ); IEnumerable nodes = from nd in xmlTree.Nodes() select nd; foreach (XNode node in nodes) Console.WriteLine(node); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4mixed content5 Dim nodes = From nd In xmlTree.Nodes() _ Select nd For Each node In nodes Console.WriteLine(node) Next ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` 1 2 3 4 mixed content 5 ``` 下列範例會建立 XML 樹狀結構，其中包含各種類型的節點。The following example creates an XML tree that contains a variety of types of nodes. 它接著會列舉的樹狀目錄中，然後再列印的節點類型的部分。It then enumerates through portions of the tree, printing the node types. ```csharp XDocument xmlTree = new XDocument( new XComment("a comment"), new XProcessingInstruction("xml-stylesheet", "type=\"text/xsl\" href=\"hello.xsl\""), new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att", "attContent"), new XElement("Child1", new XCData("CDATA content") ), new XElement("Child2", new XText("Text content") ) ) ); foreach (XNode node in xmlTree.Nodes()) { Console.WriteLine(node.NodeType); if (node.NodeType == XmlNodeType.Element) { foreach (XAttribute att in ((XElement)node).Attributes()) Console.WriteLine(att.NodeType); foreach (XNode node2 in ((XElement)node).Nodes()) { Console.WriteLine(node2.NodeType); if (node2.NodeType == XmlNodeType.Element) foreach (XNode node3 in ((XElement)node2).Nodes()) Console.WriteLine(node3.NodeType); } } } ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree As XDocument = _

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveNodes() cil managed

summary.span: 從此文件或項目中移除子節點。

span.span: Removes the child nodes from this document or element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您包含屬性的項目上呼叫這個方法，這個方法不會移除屬性。If you call this method on an element that contains attributes, this method will not remove the attributes. 若要移除項目的屬性，請使用。To remove the attributes of an element, use . 方法有相關功能。The method has related functionality. 它會移除集合中的每個節點的子節點。It removes the child nodes of every node in a collection. 這個方法會引發而事件。This method will raise the and the events. ## Examples 下列範例會建立 XML 樹狀結構，其中包含一些子節點。The following example creates an XML tree that contains some child nodes. 然後，它會呼叫這個方法，以移除子節點。It then calls this method to remove the child nodes. ```csharp XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XComment("a comment"), new XElement("Child3", 3), new XElement("Child4", 4), new XText("mixed content"), new XElement("Child5", 5) ); xmlTree.RemoveNodes(); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree); ``` ```vb Dim xmltree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4mixed content5 xmltree.RemoveNodes() Console.WriteLine(xmltree) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml ```

summary.span: 以指定的內容取代這個文件或項目的子節點。

span.span: Replaces the children nodes of this document or element with the specified content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需可以傳遞至此函式的有效內容的詳細資訊，請參閱[有效內容的 XElement 和 XDocument 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). 這個方法會引發而事件。This method will raise the and the events. 這個方法具有快照集語意。This method has snapshot semantics. 會先建立一份新的內容。It first creates a copy of the new content. 然後，它會移除此節點的所有子系節點。It then removes all children nodes of this node. 最後，它會新增新的內容做為子系節點。Finally, it adds the new content as children nodes. 這表示您可以取代本身的子節點上使用查詢的子系節點。This means that you can replace children nodes using a query on the children nodes themselves. ## Examples 下列範例會建立兩個 XML 樹狀結構，並接著會使用這個方法的其中一個內容取代成查詢的結果。The following example creates two XML trees, and then uses this method to replace the contents of one of them with the results of a query. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", 1), new XElement("Child", 2), new XElement("Child", 3), new XElement("Child", 4), new XElement("Child", 5) ); root.ReplaceNodes( from el in root.Elements() where (int)el >= 3 select el ); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 root.ReplaceNodes( _ From el In root.Elements _ Where el.Value >= 3 _ Select el) Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 3 4 5 ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ReplaceNodes(object content) cil managed

param.name: content
param.span: 包含簡單內容或內容物件 (取代自節點) 集合的內容物件。

span.span: A content object containing simple content or a collection of content objects that replace the children nodes.

summary.span: 以指定的內容取代這個文件或項目的子節點。

span.span: Replaces the children nodes of this document or element with the specified content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需可以傳遞至此函式的有效內容的詳細資訊，請參閱[有效內容的 XElement 和 XDocument 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). 這個方法會引發而事件。This method will raise the and the events. 這個方法具有快照集語意。This method has snapshot semantics. 會先建立一份新的內容。It first creates a copy of the new content. 然後，它會移除此節點的所有子系節點。It then removes all children nodes of this node. 最後，它會新增新的內容做為子系節點。Finally, it adds the new content as children nodes. 這表示您可以取代本身的子節點上使用查詢的子系節點。This means that you can replace children nodes using a query on the children nodes themselves. ## Examples 下列範例會建立 XML 樹狀結構，其中包含子系節點。The following example creates an XML tree that contains children nodes. 它然後取代所有子系節點的單一項目。It then replaces all of the children nodes with a single element. 若要查看的結果來取代子節點的範例[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]查詢，請參閱。To see an example of replacing the children nodes with the results of a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query, see . ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", 1), new XElement("Child", 2), new XElement("Child", 3), new XElement("Child", 4), new XElement("Child", 5) ); root.ReplaceNodes( from el in root.Elements() where (int)el >= 3 select el ); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 root.ReplaceNodes( _ From el In root.Elements _ Where el.Value >= 3 _ Select el) Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 3 4 5 ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ReplaceNodes(object[] content) cil managed
Public Sub ReplaceNodes (ParamArray content As Object())

span.span: A parameter list of content objects.

summary.span: 以指定的內容取代這個文件或項目的子節點。

span.span: Replaces the children nodes of this document or element with the specified content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需可以傳遞至此函式的有效內容的詳細資訊，請參閱[有效內容的 XElement 和 XDocument 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). 這個方法會引發而事件。This method will raise the and the events. 這個方法具有快照集語意。This method has snapshot semantics. 會先建立一份新的內容。It first creates a copy of the new content. 然後，它會移除此節點的所有子系節點。It then removes all children nodes of this node. 最後，它會新增新的內容做為子系節點。Finally, it adds the new content as children nodes. 這表示您可以取代本身的子節點上使用查詢的子系節點。This means that you can replace children nodes using a query on the children nodes themselves. ## Examples 下列範例會建立字典與 XML 樹狀結構。The following example creates a dictionary and an XML tree. 接著會查詢字典，以將結果投射的，並以查詢的結果取代 XML 樹狀結構的內容。It then queries the dictionary, projects the results to an of , and replaces the contents of the XML tree with the results of the query. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", 1), new XElement("Child", 2), new XElement("Child", 3), new XElement("Child", 4), new XElement("Child", 5) ); root.ReplaceNodes( from el in root.Elements() where (int)el >= 3 select el ); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 root.ReplaceNodes( _ From el In root.Elements _ Where el.Value >= 3 _ Select el) Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 3 4 5 ```
